Introduction

About Me

← Back to Home

Hi!! I'm Nathan, a junior at UC Berkeley majoring in Data Science and Computer Science. Growing up in the Bay Area, I was inspired by the transformative power of technology in everyday life all around Silicon Valley. Now, as a Data Science major at UC Berkeley, I’m passionate about applying machine learning, data analytics, and automation to solve complex, real-world problems. My passions main focus is on natural language processing and data analytics which has evolved my interest through the last many years of technological innovation. My past projects have been focused on building and finding my personal interest in the field of technology. I am looking forward to refining my technical skills and getting hands-on experience in technology.

Languages

Python, Java, C/C++, SQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript React Js, Next Js, Node Js

Education

University of California Berkeley, Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Minor in Computer Science

Projects

Built multiple projects covering a wide range of concepts such as data extraction, full-stack web development, and machine learning.
